messages.subject: Re: HS LINKS; ck out highlighted------->>>>areas for specifics
messages.msgSnippet: Looks cool! But can you send them out with just the addresses themselves instead of the A href stuff? It d be a lot easier for me to click them and check
messages.messageBody:
Looks cool! But can you send them out with just the addresses themselves
instead of the "A href" stuff? It'd be a lot easier for me to click them and
check them out then. Thanks! ~Eryn

==
"I dreamed I was a butterfly, flitting around in the sky;
then I awoke. Now I wonder: Am I a man who dreamt of
being a butterfuly, or am I a butterfly dreaming that I am
a man?" - Chuang Tsu
http://www.camenaworks.com/Eryn/
#24591173 ::she just is::
AIM :: Opal Fayre
